oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Structure of the first tetranuclear Ni(II) complex derived from N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene)-4,6-O-ethylidene-beta-D-glucopyranosylamine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAH, AK
RAO, CP
SAARENKETO, PK
RISSANEN, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: nickel
derivatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In order to understand the binding nature of the glycosylamines possessing imine functionality, a novel tetranuclear Ni(II) complex of N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene)-4,6-O-ethylidene-beta -D-glucopyranosylamine having twisted Ni4O4 cubane core was synthesized and structurally characterized.
